title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Park employees and Friends of Wilderness Battlefield volunteers dedicate the Wilderness Crossing trail NPS Photo    News Releases   Visit our news releases page for official press releases on upcoming events in the park.    Looking for the latest news? Make sure to check the park's Facebook page and twitter for the most recent news updates!   Winter Season: Go to our Operating Hours & Seasons page for information on building hours and tour times!  Also don't forget to check our calendar and Special Events page for more unique tours and programs!
